english.segment1: Help me to love like You loved. Serve like You served. To speak only words of truth. Help me to care like You cared. For a world in despair. Help me to love like You
english.segment2: What I'd give for a change. How long will it be this way
english.segment3: This complacency is wearing on me. All my passions turned to apathy. I could get up and follow You. And find my faith from before. Don't know what I'm waiting for
english.segment4: I have done what I thought I should. All these years that I've spent serving You. Tell me how did I end up like this. With doubt in my heart and my hands in a fist
english.segment5: Maybe You shining white or a blood red sun. Maybe some other sign that may never come. Maybe I must believe before I can see. What I'm waiting for
